data.text: Ezɨ Balam datɨrɨghɨn fo, Ikiavɨra Itir God a deravɨra Israelia damuamin akam mɨgei. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a faragha amizɨ moghɨn uamategha akuzir araziba bagha ghuzir puvatɨ. A raghɨrɨgha munagh gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn gari.
A garima, Israelian gumazamizibar anababa vaghvagha uan purirpenibar ikiavɨra iti. Ezɨ Godɨn Duam iza anevarazɨma,
a kamaghɨn mɨgei:
Kɨ Godɨn akar a mɨgeiba barasi.
O Jekopɨn ovavir boriba, kɨ ian purirpenibar garima,
Ian purirpenir kaba, mati detɨn temer bɨzir bar ruariba mɨtivighav iti.
Amozir avɨriba Israelian nguazim gizam.
God Isipɨn kantrin Israelia inigha men akua azenan ize.
Israelia, mati laionɨn bar gavgavim.

Ezɨ Atrivim Balak akar kam baregha atara an navim bar ikuvizɨ, a uan dafarimning mɨsuegha kamaghɨn Balam mɨgei, “Kɨ uan apaniba ikuvighamin akavsiam me darɨghasa nɨ bagha mɨkemezɨ, nɨ ize. Ezɨ nɨ 3plan dughiar kabar me deraghvɨra ikiasa me mɨgei.

Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ aghua. Nɨ datɨrɨghɨra na gitagh uamategh uan nguibamɨn mangɨ! Kɨ faragha ivezim nɨ danɨngasa akar dɨkɨrɨzim gami. Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God nɨn ivezim iniamin tuavim apɨri, eghtɨ nɨ ivezim inighan kogham.”
Ezɨ Balam a ikaragha ghaze, “Nɨ oragh. Gumazir nɨ amadaziba, kɨ kamaghɨn me mɨkemegha gɨfa.

Nɨ fo, nɨ ti uan atrivimɨn dɨpenimɨn itir silvaba ko golba bar, na danɨngtɨ, kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn akam batuegh bizitam uan ifongiamɨn a damuan kogham. Akar Ikiavɨra Itir God mɨkemezimra, kɨ anarɨra mɨkɨmam.”
Egha Balam kamaghɨn Balak mɨgei, “Kɨ uamategh uan adarazi bagh mangasava ami. Egh kɨ faragh ikiangsɨzim nɨ danɨngtɨ, nɨ fogham, Israelia gɨn manmaghɨn ganamin araziba nɨn adarazir amuam.”
Egha akar kam kamaghɨn a mɨgei:
Kɨ Godɨn akar a mɨgeiba barasi.
Kɨ gɨn otivamin bizibar gara,
Egh an apanir Idomɨn itiba, a bar me agɨvagham.
Israelian tongɨn atrivitam otogh, uan apaniba dɨkabɨragham,
Egha Balam irebamɨn mɨn garir bizimɨn aven Amalekian gari. Egha kamaghɨn mɨgei:
Egha Balam irebamɨn mɨn garir bizimɨn aven a Kinian gari. Egha kamaghɨn mɨgei:
Eghtɨ Asuria, gɨn izɨ ia mɨsogh ia gasɨghasɨgh,
Egha Balam akar mam ua kamaghɨn a mɨkeme:
Saiprusɨn mɨdorozir gumaziba uan kurir ekiaba inigh izɨ, Asuria ko Eberia mɨsogh me abɨragham.
Egha Balam dɨkavigha uamategha uan nguibamɨn zuima, Atrivim Balak uaghan uamategha uan nguibamɨn ghu.
